description: Try our easy to follow Orange, Chocolate And Ricotta Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Orange, Chocolate And Ricotta Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Greenâ€™s choc chip pancake shake
1 pkt Cadbury dark chocolate baking chips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat frying pan on a low-medium heat.
Combine ricotta, orange zest and icing sugar. Mix until combined and smooth. Cover and place into fridge.
Pour batter onto preheated frying pan and add a dollop of ricotta mix onto the middle of batter. Cover with pancake mix. Cook on both sides for 1-2 minutes, or until golden brown.
Serve with a dollop of the ricotta mixture, oranges and a chocolate drizzle.
